Update setup-worktree.sh to use bd worktree
description: Replace git worktree commands with bd worktree create/remove. This auto-configures beads database redirect and proper gitignore.

title: Add agent bead creation to worker spawn flow
description: Workers should be tracked as agent beads (type=agent) with state machine: idle→spawning→running→done. Use bd agent spawn/done commands.

title: Store prepared prompts in beads issue notes
description: After refinement, issues should have pre-baked prompts stored in notes. Workers just inject the prompt, no exploration needed. Schema: prepared.prompt, prepared.skills, prepared.completion

title: Update PRIME.md with unified command documentation
description: Replace bd-work/bd-swarm/bd-swarm-auto references with /conductor:work. Add molecule and agent bead patterns.

title: Create install.sh script for plugin installation
description: Script to copy plugins to ~/.claude/plugins/ and optionally link PRIME.md to projects.

title: Create conductor workflow proto (mol-conductor-wave)
description: Define reusable molecule template for conductor waves. Epic with template label containing: setup worktrees → spawn workers → monitor → merge → review → cleanup → push.

title: Replace custom monitoring with bd agent list
description: Remove custom monitor-workers.sh polling in favor of bd agent list --state running. Simpler and uses built-in heartbeat detection.

title: Update /conductor:work to use prepared prompts
description: If issue has prepared.prompt in notes, use it directly. Skip on-the-fly prompt crafting. Fall back to live crafting if not refined.
